channel.title: Help with running server!
channel.description:
ive got a server ready and everything. ive tried port forwarding many many times... but still no luck, can anyone help me with getting my server online without the use of hamachi or port-forwarding? tell me how to here.. or give me the site where i can get some help on this. thanks alot
Person who helps me with this will get mod/admin on my server... thanks alot guys@@!

item.title: Help with running server!
item.dc:creator: @DarkSoldier DarkSoldier
item.description:
@DarkSoldier wrote:

uhhh im using a wireless router and i got 2 pc’s using internet… what does thaT MEAN? i have to portforward?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2008, 03:58:47 PM[/size][hr]can anyone give me a step by step instruction how to port forward my “D-Link G604T wireless ADSL Router” ??

Read full topic

item.title: Help with running server!
item.dc:creator: @burnout burnout
item.description:
@burnout wrote:

if its not a router and just a modem then you just have to get the no-ip installed and add ur ip to it then yes it will work (there arent multipul computers connecting to the same ports so no you dont need to)

Read full topic

item.title: Help with running server!
item.dc:creator: @DarkSoldier DarkSoldier
item.description:

so that are you saying… i dont need to port forward… all i need to do i go to no-ip and “add” a host then download the no-ip duc… and then?
do i need to do somethinb bout the port? or what?
allow the port 43594? or what?

Read full topic
